65028.summary: Some customers in the Barlow Creek area of Quesnel are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
65028.title: Aug 2 - Quesnel (Barlow Creek) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
